pdf_protocol

class pdf_protocol.pdfprotocol(filename, variables, plot_reverberationTime, plot_reverberationTimeRatio)

Class to retreive parameters out of .json session file and to create pdf protocol

__init__(filename, variables, plot_reverberationTime, plot_reverberationTimeRatio)

Constructor for pdf object.

Parameters

  • volume (int) – Volume of the room in cubic meters

  • variables (dict) – Dictionary with json session parameters

  • plot_reverberationTime (plotly figure) – Plotly figure of the reverberation time

  • plot_reverberationTime_ratio (Plotly figure) – Plotly figure of the reverberation time ratio The ratio of calculated reverberation time to wanted reverberation time. Wanted reverberation time is based on the rooms use case and its volume.

  • font (str) – Sets the font for the PDF file

Returns

pdfprotocol instance, which handles the PDF protocol

Return type

class: pdfprotocol

basic_variables()

Returns the variables, that are not in another dictionary within the .json session file

Returns

usecase for the room, volume of the room, number of main walls, are people in the room, number of people in the room

Return type

str, int, int, boolean, int

wall_variables(index)

Returns the variables for a specific main wall given by the index

Parameters

index (int) – Index of the main wall for which the wall variables shall be retreived

Returns

name, area, material category, material, number of subareas (of given main wall)

Return type

str, float, str, str, int

subwall_variables(index, subindex)

Returns the variables for a specific subwall given by the index

Parameters

  • index (int) – Index of the main wall on which the subwall lies

  • subindex (int) – Index of the subwall for which the subwall variables shall be retreived

Returns

area, category, material (of given subwall)

Return type

float, str, str

people_variables(index)

Returns the variables regarding people in the room for a given group

Parameters

index (int) – Index of the group of people as set in the web-app

Returns

amount of people, description of people

Return type

int, str

protocol()

Creates the PDF file out of the .json session variables
